title: Installation issue:  ecp-proxy-apps
body:
spack install --source ecp-proxy-apps

==> Searching for binary cache of amg
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for amg found: installing from source
==> Cloning git repository: https://github.com/LLNL/AMG.git at tag 1.1
Fetching tags only, you probably meant:
  git fetch --tags
==> No checksum needed when fetching with git
==> Already staged amg-1.1-lqvvjouwtvmhgvf7x3owqee5bgwswcuj in /usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/var/spack/stage/amg-1.1-lqvvjouwtvmhgvf7x3owqee5bgwswcuj
==> No patches needed for amg
==> Building amg [MakefilePackage]
==> Copying source to /usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.9.3/amg-1.1-lqvvjouwtvmhgvf7x3owqee5bgwswcuj/share/amg/src
==> Executing phase: 'edit'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'test/amg'
 
/usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/amg/package.py:55, in install:
         53    def install(self, spec, prefix):
         54        mkdirp(prefix.bin)
  >>     55        install('test/amg', prefix.bin)
         56        install_tree('docs', prefix.docs)
 
See build log for details:
  /usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/var/spack/stage/amg-1.1-lqvvjouwtvmhgvf7x3owqee5bgwswcuj/AMG/spack-build.out


m /usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/var/spack/stage/amg-1.1-lqvvjouwtvmhgvf7x3owqee5bgwswcuj/AMG/spack-build.out

****

==> Using default implementation: skipping edit phase.
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> 'make' '-j128' 'INCLUDE_CFLAGS=-DTIMER_USE_MPI -DHYPRE_USING_OPENMP -fopenmp' 'INCLUDE_LFLAGS=-lm -fopenmp' 'CC=/usr/WS2/ramesh/spac
k/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.9.3/openmpi-3.1.3-an55bniecxfoaie3k3ugwng6uhbbhyf5/bin/mpicc'
Making utilities ...

/usr/WS2/ramesh/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ppc64le/gcc-4.9.3/openmpi-3.1.3-an55bniecxfoaie3k3ugwng6uhbbhyf5/bin/mpicc -o amg_link
list.o -c -I.. -DTIMER_USE_MPI -DHYPRE_USING_OPENMP -fopenmp  amg_linklist.c
Cannot open configuration file /usr/tce/packages/spectrum-mpi/ibm/spectrum-mpi-rolling-release/share/openmpi/mpicc-wrapper-data.txt
**Error parsing data file mpicc: Not found
make[1]: *** [Makefile:108: amg_linklist.o] Error 243**
